short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Raw Data on Block Explorers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blockchain data is complex, and on block explorers, it can be a real pain to understand what happened.

Noves allows you to skip the raw technical data and read a simple, human-friendly description of what the transaction did, e.g. "Swapped 1 ETH for 4000 USDT". Whenever a transaction is viewed on a supported block explorer, Noves will display the transaction summary and an easy-to-read asset flow diagram.

50+ blockchains supported, including every major EVM chain (Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, etc.)
